external_references.description: Jansen, W . (2021, January 12). Abusing cloud services to fly under the radar. Retrieved January 19, 2021.

description: [Chimera](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0114) has used [ipconfig](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0100), [Ping](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0097), and tracert to enumerate the IP address and network environment and settings of the local host.(Citation: NCC Group Chimera January 2021)
